memories.text: for these past few weeks you're my first thought when i wake up
your smile is a dora bowl!
every love song reminds me of you since we met
i could yap to you for hours and never get bored
i love how you remember the little things that matter to me
i love how we can communicate
i love how you can make me smile even when you're so far
THE FACT THAT I AM LITERALLY THE MERMAID YOU WERE LOOKING FOR
the way i feel so connected to you makes me convinced that we are soulmates
you made me believe in love again
not simping but just letting u know im not tiny
you could be the best thing this island has ever given me
i love how you can match my energy in every way
i love getting notifications from you
